unnormalised: Hey petrolheads! The Indian automotive scene is buzzing like a Bajaj scooter in peak Delhi traffic!
normalised: Hey petrolheads! The Indian automotive scene is buzzing like a Bajaj scooter in peak Delhi traffic!

unnormalised: Mahindra just dropped the all-new 'Scorpio N' refresh – supposedly tougher than your average North Indian mother-in-law! They’re claiming improved mileage (15 kmpl, anyone?) and a swanky new infotainment system. Prices starting at a cool Rs. 12 Lakh, ex-showroom.
normalised: Mahindra just dropped the all-new 'Scorpio N' refresh – supposedly tougher than your average North Indian mother-in-law! They’re claiming improved mileage (fifteen kilometer per liter, anyone?) and a swanky new infotainment system. Prices starting at a cool rupee twelve lakh, ex-showroom.

unnormalised: Meanwhile, Tata Motors is teasing something called the 'Punch EV.' No official launch date yet, but rumors suggest it'll be packing some serious range and a panoramic sunroof perfect for stargazing near Lonavala.
normalised: Meanwhile, Tata Motors is teasing something called the 'Punch E V.' No official launch date yet, but rumors suggest it'll be packing some serious range and a panoramic sunroof perfect for stargazing near Lonavala.

unnormalised: Dr. Reddy, a leading automotive analyst, says "The EV market is heating up faster than a tandoor oven!"
normalised: Doctor Reddy, a leading automotive analyst, says "The E V market is heating up faster than a tandoor oven!"

unnormalised: And speaking of hot, Maruti Suzuki is rumored to be working on a Jimny with a bigger engine. More power for tackling those Himalayan roads, eh? Also, Hero MotoCorp just launched their new e-scooter, the 'Vida V1 Pro', with a charging station covering 500 sq ft in Koramangala, Bangalore. Get ready for some electric scooting, folks! Stay tuned for more updates.
normalised: And speaking of hot, Maruti Suzuki is rumored to be working on a Jimny with a bigger engine. More power for tackling those Himalayan roads, eh? Also, Hero MotoCorp just launched their new e-scooter, the 'Vida V one Pro', with a charging station covering five hundred square feet in Koramangala, Bangalore. Get ready for some electric scooting, folks! Stay tuned for more updates.
